288 likes, 17 comments - rictus_erectus on June 7, 2024: "The Real Force Behind Mad Max George MillerüåüWhile Mel Gibson's portrayal of Mad Max is undoubtedly iconic and has left a lasting impact, it's important to remember that the character and the entire Mad Max universe were created by George Miller. üé¨ Miller's vision, direction, and storytelling are what brought the post-apocalyptic world of Mad Max to life. Without his creativity and dedication, we wouldn't have this legendary franchise to discuss. üåç

Moreover, thinking back to the first "Mad Max" film, the antagonist Toecutter, played by Hugh Keays-Byrne, played a huge role in highlighting Mel Gibson and bringing him to the forefront. Hugh's brilliant portrayal of Toecutter was crucial; Mel Gibson's character, Max, didn't speak much and was primarily action-driven, reacting to Hugh's performance. This dynamic helped the audience get behind Mel Gibson's character as Mad Max. üí•

Arguably, the combination of George Miller's vision and Hugh's brilliant portrayal launched Mel Gibson's career. So, while Mel Gibson's contribution is significant, the true creator and driving force behind Mad Max is George Miller. üé•

#MadMax #GeorgeMiller #FilmHistory #IconicRoles #MovieLegends".
